DOC.detailed_description: Our overall objective develop evaluate intervention maintain decrease body mass index ; specifically , recruit randomize 30 worksites two year intervention : - Influence worksite environment , include policy procedure , increase worksite access healthy food physical activity opportunity - Promote individual behavior change , increase awareness energy balance ; build physical activity intervention promote increase level energy expenditure combination increase daily physical activity regular , structure exercise ; building dietary intervention promote decrease calorie intake . Our primary aim : 1 ) Evaluate effectiveness intervention reduce maintain body mass index randomize control trial worksites . Our secondary aim : 1 . Assess change worksite environment access healthy food physical activity opportunity attributable intervention 2 . Assess change individual level physical activity energy intake attributable intervention 3 . Assess change sequalae weight loss include biomarkers metabolic effect , weight loss quality life symptom measure ; 4 . Estimate cost-effectiveness intervention control weight .
